More Chinese tied the knot in 2023, lifting marriage rates for first time in nine yearsThe number of new marriages in China jumped 12.4% in 2023 from a year earlier, reversing a downtrend that has lasted for almost a decade as more youth tied the knot after delaying their nuptials due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 07:04:54 GMT 6CVFAPMZQNMD5BTZ4GRPWJI5LA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/more-chinese-tied-knots-2023-lifting-marriage-rates-first-time-nine-years-2024-03-18/Reuters世界中国
China considers taking part in Swiss Ukraine peace talks, ambassador saysChina will consider taking part in a peace conference aimed at ending the war in Ukraine which neutral Switzerland plans to host in the coming months, the Asian country's ambassador to Bern was quoted as saying on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 07:03:16 GMT CC3YS42AVBOD3KZXNKHFQ34QKY https://www.reuters.com/world/china-considers-takeing-part-swiss-ukraine-peace-talks-ambassador-says-2024-03-18/Reuters世界

China's BYD launches new version of Destroyer 07 hybrid at lower starting priceChinese electric vehicle giant BYD launched on Monday a new version of its Destroyer 07 hybrid car at a starting price 11.3% lower than its predecessor, Reuters calculations showed. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 05:19:12 GMT MMA44NJDNFNEXN5J2YTBT5ZL3A https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinas-bid-launches-new-version-destroyer-07-hybrid-lower-starting-price-2024-03-18/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Warehouse developers bet on India as companies look beyond ChinaLand is getting hard to find in a sprawling industrial park in southern India where workers are scrambling to build modern new warehouses and factories for companies betting on the country's economic boom or diversifying their supply chains beyond China. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 05:16:40 GMT QMZRXYVJFZP6RDUBMN5B7EOBKY https://www.reuters.com/business/warehouse-developers-bet-india-companies-look-beyond-china-2024-03-18/Dhwani Pandya, Praveen Paramasivam商业
China warns citizens in Singapore to stay away from gamblingChina's embassy in Singapore on Monday urged its citizens in the city-state to stay away from all forms of betting, saying gambling overseas violates Chinese laws. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 04:45:04 GMT G46PNZ5P6RKMLNT7ECV图https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-warns-singapore-citizens-stay-away-gambling-2024-03-18/Reuters世界亚太地区
China foreign minister willing to strengthen communications with New ZealandChina says it wants to strengthen communications with New Zealand and work to maintain peace and stability in the region as the foreign ministers of the two countries met on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 04:04:53 GMT 3F5U732J7VL33KSGVE43TFZLPM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-foreign-minister-willing-to-strengthen-communications-with-new-zealand-2024-03-18/Lucy Craymer, Stella Qiu世界亚太地区
China's upbeat industrial output, retail sales tempered by frail propertyChina's factory output and retail sales beat expectations in the January-February period, marking a solid start for 2024 and offering some relief to policymakers even as weakness in the property sector remains a drag on the economy and confidence. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 02:25:27 GMT GVBR74I5SZNCZBCQFJE4V44WNM https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/china-jan-feb-industrial-output-retail-sales-beat-expectations-2024-03-18/Ellen Zhang, Joe Cash市场宏观问题
Chinese foreign minister to meet former Australia PM Keating on visitFormer Australian Prime Minister Paul Keating, a prominent supporter of China who has criticised Australia's AUKUS nuclear submarine deal with the U.S., said he would meet Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi this week in a bid to improve bilateral ties. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 02:25:06 GMT WCH5FHAPXROKRPVK3AH4O34KSY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinese-foreign-minister-meets-formers-australia-pm-keating-visit-2024-03-18/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
China's property investment declines slow but sector still shakyChina's fragile housing market opened this year with slower declines in property investment and sales, buoyed by government efforts to arrest a protracted downturn in the sector, however, analysts were wary of calling an end to the downturn just yet. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 02:05:34 GMT 2K3W6LE4ZNNPDNKKBCQICYHP44 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinas-jan-feb-property-investment-falls-90-yy-2024-03-18/Liangping Gao, Ryan Woo市场宏观问题
China Jan-Feb industrial output rises 7%, beats expectationsChina's industrial output grew 7.0% year-on-year in the January-February period, data showed on Monday, accelerating from the 6.8% pace seen in December and beating expectations, marking a solid start for 2024 and offering tentative relief to policymakers. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 02:03:33 GMT PXSIT4BZSZPABBLI55ZNAZGDRE https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/china-jan-feb-industrial-output-rises-7-beats-expectations-2024-03-18/Reuters市场宏观问题
